pullRequest.title: healthcare API: update fhir/ samples from v1beta1 to v1
pullRequest.bodyText:
NOTE: This PR is fundamentally a branch of https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples/tree/master/healthcare/v1beta1 to v1. The code has been previously reviewed in this repository.
After all healthcare/v1 samples are approved, I'll delete the existing v1beta1/ directory.

nodes.bodyText: Really should use GSON or JsonObject to create these.

commit.message: healthcare API: update fhir/ samples from v1beta1 to v1
address review comments, branches causing issues

beforeCommit.message: healthcare API: update fhir/ samples from v1beta1 to v1

afterCommit.message: address review comments, branches causing issues

commit.message: upgrade to shared-configuration 1.0.17 and fix style issues

nodes.bodyText: Ok for now, but at some point it would be good if you delete all the resources you create via these tests.
